about_the_game:
Fill out more of your game’s soundtrack with the spectacular tracks of Classic Fantasy Music Pack Vol 3! Murray Atkinson is back with another pack of music, this time with 13 BGMs ranging from angelic tunes that turns a forest pond into a mystical center of power to headbanging rock when your heroes face off against a monstrous boss! Seek out adventure to the strong drumbeats of ‘Soaring Skies’, explore mysterious locals to the creeping strings of ‘Spiralling Mysteries’, and wander familiar hometowns to ‘Daydreaming’s peaceful piano. Battle normal foes while encouraging tunes bounce around, and make sure your players know it’s time to get serious when the music shifts to the racing electric guitars of the boss theme.

And if those tracks aren’t classic enough for you, this pack also includes some famous orchestral classical pieces remade to fit into your game! Have your heroes compete in a duel of wits while violins strum the recognizable tune of ‘Carmen Habanera’, or use it to set the mood during a noble’s grand party. Or create a cutscene where words aren’t needed with the haunting piano of ‘Gymnopedie No 1’ playing as a beloved party member is laid to rest. And if you really like the vibe of familiar songs in your games you might also like Classical Favorites, an entire pack of famous orchestrated classical pieces!

If you’ve been wanting some classical-inspired tracks for certain cutscenes or just love Murray’s musical melodies, pick up Classic Fantasy Music Pack Vol 3 today!

Contents:

* 11 original royalty free songs
* 2 Bonus popular classical songs (both in the public domain)
* m4a and ogg file formats included


Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games


Songlist:

Battle Theme - United Front
Boss Battle - The Champions
Daydreaming
Entangled Delusions
Manor Cathedral
Pleasant Valley
Sad Story
Soaring Skies
Spiralling Mysteries
The Bogwarthius Columns
The Invitation

Bonus 2 Popular Orchestral Classics:

Carmen Habanera (Bizet)
Gymnopedie No 1 (Satie)
